basics.name: Luis Fernández
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with over 8 years of experience in developing web and mobile applications.
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with over 8 years of experience in developing web and mobile applications. Specialized in ReactJS, NextJS, and React Native for the frontend, and in building REST APIs with FastAPI, Django, and ExpressJS for the backend. Strong expertise in designing and managing MySQL and PostgreSQL databases, as well as deploying applications on AWS.

work.name: Rebus Technology
work.summary: Development of websites and mobile applications using ReactJS and React Native for the frontend, and Python with FastAPI and Django for the backend, deploying solutions on AWS services to ensure scalability and performance.

work.summary: Development of websites and plugins in WordPress, integrating modern functionalities with ReactJS to deliver dynamic and customized experiences.
